alert.note: Alert for Cass; Otoe; Sarpy (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 04 at 2:05AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Mills, east central Sarpy, north central Otoe and central Cass Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 205 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles east of Elmwood, or 21 miles south of Gretna, moving northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Weeping Water around 210 AM CDT. Murray around 220 AM CDT. Beaver Lake around 225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Bellevue, Offutt AFB, Plattsmouth, Glenwood and Pacific Junction. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 29 and 42. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
